taskbody.context: Running these commands will stop and remove all Docker containers in your server. It will not remove any data in the folder TESTOPS_FILE_STORAGE_PATH and your database. Ensure to use the command appropriate for your package plan.

step.cmd: To stop Katalon On-Premises License Server only, run the following command:

taskbody.result: Running either command successfully will stop Katalon's On-Premises from running.
